description:
Create graphical representations of the contigs and their annotations.

It works best for relatively small datasets, of a few megabases or a few hundred contigs.

WARNING: THIS IS A WORK IN PROGRESS. THE API MAY CHANGE.

parameters.name: Input
parameters.help: names of input genbank files. If not supplied, reads from stdin.

parameters.name: Height
parameters.help: height of the contig plot, in pixels

parameters.name: Width
parameters.help: width of the contig plot, in pixels

parameters.name: Types
parameters.help: Feature types to include in the plot. Default is 'CDS exon repeat_region ncRNA rRNA tRNA Domainator Domain_Search'.

parameters.name: Feature Height
parameters.help: height of the feature arrows, in pixels.

parameters.name: Feature Font Size
parameters.help: font size of the feature labels, in pixels.

parameters.name: Metadata
parameters.help: tab separated files of additional contig metadata.

parameters.name: Color By
parameters.help: Color the contig lines in the plot based on this column of the metadata table.
